code: How often have you had five or more drinks in one day during the past year [Reported]
subject: Amy V. Baxter (no stated gender), DoB: 1987-02-20 ( Medical Record Number: 1032702 (use: usual, ))

note: Some measures (like electronic Clinical Quality Measure (eCQM) used by CMS) define "risky drinker" differently based on sex: 4 or more drinks per day for women and 5 or more drinks per day for men. The LOINC for 4 or more drinks per day is [LOINC: 75889-6].

Some measures (like electronic Clinical Quality Measure (eCQM) used by CMS) define "risky drinker" differently based on sex: 4 or more drinks per day for women and 5 or more drinks per day for men. The LOINC for 4 or more drinks per day is [LOINC: 75889-6].
